comment._content: It looks like  a scene from the American civil War.?

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/angeljim46] it does look like an explosion doesn't it? [http://www.flickr.com/photos/82934060@N05] we're not really sure what this photograph depicts. It's a bit of a mystery! :)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 82934060@N05
comment._content: yep. I can see dirt being hurled into the air. and some smoke. The boys are looking in that direction, like they were waiting for  it to happen, They may have been blowing up stumps, or something.? A planned explosion I think, not  an artillery round just landing. Intriguing ,thats for sure:))

comment.author: 82934060@N05
comment._content: Or is is just a small fire.?

comment.author: 7806261@N06
comment._content: Could be post flood repairs, the bank opposite has had all veg removed. The bridge seems to end on sediment banks, with no track. The bridge could a pontoon bridge?
